After Weight Loss to Maintain
Drink more water

Drinking a glass of water 30 minutes before a meal can lead to greater weight loss. It has also been proven that drinking water can boost your metabolism,which result in more calories burned throughout the day.
Go for walks

Even thogh it may seem loke such a simple activity,many studies have proven that walking is an effective mathod of reducing and maintaing body fat. walking for as little as 30 minutes a day will bring grest results.
Get enough sleep
Sleep quality and quantity can affect an individuals weight loss success.In fact,there is evidence that people who sleep less are more likely to be overweight or obese.
Cut back on sugar and salt
Consuming too much sugar is one of the main causes of weight gain. The daily limit of sugar is 6-9 teaspoons.However,the average Human cobsmes around 20 teaspoons of sugar each day!
